ModMetaData.name: Despicable
ModMetaData.author: DCSzar
ModMetaData.description: A lightweight alternative to RJW and NAL's facial animations. Built for maximum compatibility with vanilla-style mods. Less built for gooning, more-so built for immersion and extending characters and their interactions; Without changing gameplay much, if at all. Best used alongside Intimacy, but can work standalone. CREDITS TO C0FFEEE FOR ANIMATION FRAMEWORK!
